body:
GoShimmer is first and foremost a research prototype node for exploring the implementation of IOTA 2.0.

Status: Builds and starts up but not tested yet - to be followed up with future improvements determined by time and interest.

Further information on the software:
https://github.com/iotaledger/meta-iota/wiki/honeycombOS-Notes

Repo:
https://github.com/iotaledger/goshimmer
title: goshimmer: new package
